tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: What If Everyone JUMPED At Once?
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Click HERE to subscribe to Vsauce for more! It's FREE! www.youtube.com Follow @tweetsauce Tell Geek and Sundry that Vsauce says "hi!" and SUB!: www.youtube.com www.Facebook.com music courtesy of www.SoundCloud.com Thanks to: www.youtube.com and www.youtube.com For helping me with this video at Summer in the City!! theINENIvlogs behind the scenes Summer in the City vid with me: www.youtube.com Why videos views freeze in the 300s on YouTube (sub to this channel FTW, seriously): www.youtube.com Japan Earthquake and Earth's rotation: en.wikipedia.org All people in one place LIVING: persquaremile.com shoulder-to-shoulder: news.nationalgeographic.com BBC Jump Video: www.bbc.co.uk SCALE OF UNIVERSE AWESOME: htwins.net STRAIGHTDOPE article on a jump: www.straightdope.com Dot Physics on the jump: www.wired.com Interactive scale of the universe: scaleofuniverse.com Decimate: www.etymonline.com Dunbar's Number: en.wikipedia.org NPR story on Dunbar's number: www.npr.org Life Expectency: en.wikipedia.org How many people you meet in your life: eclectic24.wordpress.com Newton's Third Law: www.physicsclassroom.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: They too fat to jump ﻿
my favorite is 1:13﻿
That's a stereotype.﻿ All countries have their obese people. Have you ever been to the mountainous regions of Maine and New York?
ever﻿ heard of the words "average" and "probability statistics"? If you've never heard of those words, just take this comment as a joke.
That made no sense.. lols he's talking about everyone in the world jumping and nothing﻿ happening.
You can also fit everyone (in a crowd) in the﻿ province of Utrecht (the Netherlands)
*calculable﻿
Vaginal Fantasy Book﻿ Club...
It may be true that the world population can﻿ fit into Texas, but with that many fatwas Americans, it will fit the entire country of Russia.
You didn't get﻿ the joke...
yay for felicia﻿ day :DD
Misspelled your mom,mate. ﻿
Ugh racist is racis and nothing﻿ else.Dickhead!
The universe would implode.﻿
DUDE IM TOTALLY﻿ GUNNA DECIMATE THIS TEST!
The Joke was, Americans﻿ are fat. That's a pretty simple one.. still makes no sense as to why he would put that
Hospitals﻿ get overloaded nine months later.
2116 peeps didn't﻿ jump
i decimate women﻿
... well that explains that every time you wake up on the floor, it's already﻿ past lunch time..
WHAT FELICIA WHY YOU﻿ SO DAY?
You﻿ too dumb to spell
i never knew that science was﻿ this interesting :O
My brain﻿ hurts....
